info.summary:
Sergio M. Savaresi works as a Professor in Polytechnic University of Milan,Department of Electronics,Information and Bioengineering, and his\her h-index is 38, g-index is 71. His\Her interests are :
 control system; vehicle dynamics; Two-Wheeled Vehicles; force; mathematical model;
